directions: In a bowl, sift the ground ancho chile, cayenne pepper, and cinnamon with the confectioners' sugar. Beat in the cream cheese and butter with an electric mixer on medium speed until the frosting is smooth; mix in the vanilla extract. Use to frost cupcakes or cakes.
ingredients: 4 cups confectioners' sugar, or more as needed
1/2 teaspoon clear vanilla extract, or to taste
title: Chili Cream Cheese Frosting
